title: Pumping cold water into rivers could act as ‘air conditioning’ for fish
description: Hundreds of salmon, trout and other fish sought shelter from summer heat in human-made shelters, suggesting a way to help fish adapt to river warming.

title: Dinosaur feathers may have been more birdlike than previously thought
description: Feather proteins can change during fossilization, raising questions about what dinosaur feathers really can tell us about feather evolution.
